articles.author: Ingrid Lunden
articles.title: UK opens office in San Francisco to tackle AI risk - TechCrunch
articles.description: The AI Safety Institute, a U.K. body that aims to assess and address risks in AI platforms, has said it will open a second location in San Francisco.
articles.content: Ahead of the AI safety summit kicking off in Seoul, South Korea later this week, its co-host, the United Kingdom, is expanding its own efforts in the field. The AI Safety Institute, a U.K. body set u… [+4595 chars]

articles.author: Jason Ma
articles.title: 'Copper is the new oil,' and prices could soar 50% as AI, green energy, and military spending boost demand, top commodities analyst says - Fortune
articles.description: "But I go back to the 2000s, I was bullish on oil then as I am on copper today."
articles.content: Copper is emerging as the next indispensable industrial commodity, mirroring oils rise in earlier decades, a top commodities analyst said.This time around, new forces in the economy, namely the adven… [+2125 chars]
